statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -10 \\ 12 \\ 17 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 8 \\ -9 \\ -13 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 12 \\ -12 \\ -18 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
